Articles.Content:
Okay people, I have wrecked my entire 350h+ gameplay due to my messing around on graphics. That's just great.

No problem! No given up! I'm gonna start from scratch and see what happens.

So I'm asking to you KSP veterans, what graphics mods usable for KSP 1.9.1? Or what do you suggest?

Most of you gonna respond me like to downgrade 1.8.1. But some of important part packs only usable for 1.9.1.

Thank you for your support and fly safe around space!

Someone made an experimental version of scaterer for 1.9.1

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/103963-wip181-scatterer-atmospheric-scattering-v0055-20012020-19-unofficial-builds-in-op/
I suggest Astronomers Visual Pack with the updated scatterer and SVE, RTB made a separate thread for his updates.
